title: [P22] The Glamourous Broadway Tourist jumps over the Creepy Squareface
content:
Lanston Type Co. Summer 2006 releases!

Nothing says summer like a tall cool Pabst. Pabst Italic that is!  
To accompany the ever popular LTC Pabst Oldstyle is Pabst Italic and Swash  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/pabst.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/pabst.html)

These and 35 other new fonts may not really cool off the summer heat, but some classic faces mixed with a few unusual twists will go down easy with a 25% introductory discount.

LTC Bodoni 175 - 4 fonts of classic Bodoni + 2 OpenType Pro fonts  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/bodoni.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/bodoni.html)

LTC Broadway - 2 Art Deco standards, newly digitized  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/broadway.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/broadway.html)

LTC Creepy Ornaments - Just like the name says  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/creepyorn.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/creepyorn.html)

LTC Glamour - Somewhat glamorous with 8 styles  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/glamour.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/glamour.html)

LTC Fournier Le Jeune - A decorative French indulgence  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/fournier.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/fournier.html)

LTC Goudy Sans - 6 variations of a Goudy classic  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/goudysans.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/goudysans.html)

LTC Jenson - Wm. Morris inspired 5 styles + 2 OpenType fonts  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/jenson.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/jenson.html)

LTC Kaatskill - Another Goudy classic in 3 styles + 1 OpenType  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/kaatskill.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/kaatskill.html)

LTC Law Italic - Stately and dignified  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/lawitalic.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/lawitalic.html)

LTC Ornamental Initials - Decorative Capitals  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/ornamentalinitials.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/ornamentalinitials.html)

LTC Squareface - 2 geometric Slab Serifs, also as 1 OpenType  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/squareface.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/squareface.html)

LTC Tourist Gothic - 2 Modern Condensed Sans Serifs, + 1 OT Pro font  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/touristgothic.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130180019/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/touristgothic.html)

To get your 25% discount off of these titles, just use the  
code:  
Summer25 during checkout in the online shopping cart.

Valid until August 31, 2006  
——————-  
Just in case you’ve been eyeing the entire Lanston collection (over 180 fonts plus dozens of OpenType “Pro” fonts) but just need a little incentive to take the plunge… Until August 14th, you can get all the Lanston fonts as one collection for only $1099.95 (regular price 1249.95). Please call or email to place an order.
author: paul d hunt
